As Canada continues to fly out citizens from the novel coronavirus outbreak epicentre in Wuhan, China, confusion remains for Canadian permanent residents still stuck in the lockdown zone. Mike Le Couteur reports on the conflicting information from both Chinese and Canadian officials.
